sentences.sentence: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing.
sentences.translation: 没有痛苦和牺牲，就没有收获。

sentences.sentence: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
sentences.translation: 如果一切皆完美，你就永远不会学到东西，永远不会成长。

sentences.sentence: If you can love your enemy, you already have the victory.
sentences.translation: 若你能爱你的敌人，那你已经取得了胜利。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes you have to sacrifice to do the right thing.
sentences.translation: 有时候，为了做成正确的事，你必须付出代价。

sentences.sentence: Your journey forward will not always be easy.
sentences.translation: 你的前途未必总是一帆风顺。
